trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> whose position corresponds to a value.
trans-unit.target: 위치가 값에 해당하는 이동 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />이 있는 스크롤 막대를 제공하는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration")
trans-unit.target: ![스크롤 막대 설명](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "스크롤 막대 설명")

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 제어 이루어져는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 컨트롤과 두 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can increase and decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control by pressing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls or by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 늘리고 줄일 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 키를 눌러 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 이동 또는 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default range of values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property is from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 값의 기본 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 속성이 0에서 1입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> represents the linear distance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> between the endpoints of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 선형 거리를 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 의 끝점 간에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can change the default range of values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 값의 기본 범위를 변경할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control to appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> 속성 결정 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 가로 또는 세로로 표시 됩니다에 대해이 속성을 정의 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> or from left to right for a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 값이 위에서 아래로 세로 증가 되도록 방향이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 또는 왼쪽에서 오른쪽 가로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property is not explicitly defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 다음 표에 속성은 해당 하는 것에 대 한 바인딩 대상 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 속성 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> 속성이 명시적으로 정의 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly define the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property, the binding does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 명시적으로 정의 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> 속성은 바인딩이 발생 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 속성

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 속성

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 사용 하 여 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: To display <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 스크롤 막대가 포함 된 상자 안에 콘텐츠를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollBar Control
trans-unit.target: ScrollBar 컨트롤 사용자 지정

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 동일한 속성 설정을 적용 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및 관련 된 상태를 보려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, 참조 [스크롤 막대 스타일 및 템플릿](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [기본 WPF 테마](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 경우 해당 속성을 둘 다에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤의 기본 템플릿에 하 고 사용 하 여 설정 됩니다는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> that has a range of values between 0 and 100.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에는 가로 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 0과 100 사이의 값의 범위는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that the user is dragging the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of the horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> to the value that is provided in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 가로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />에 제공된 값으로 끌고 있음을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter" />에 알리는 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자의 엄지 단추를 끌 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 반환 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 가 해당 명령을 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 반환 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 실행는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 이 명령을 사용 하 여 지연 된 스크롤할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 은 `true` 및 사용자가 끌어올는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>의 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 놓을 때까지 변경 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand> for a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤 지연을 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 실행는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand> 가로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 끌면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that the user is dragging the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> of the vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> to the value that is provided in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 세로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />에 제공된 값으로 끌고 있음을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter" />에 알리는 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자의 엄지 단추를 끌 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 반환 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 가 해당 명령을 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 반환 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 실행는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 이 명령을 사용 하 여 지연 된 스크롤할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 은 `true` 및 사용자가 끌어올는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>의 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 놓을 때까지 변경 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand> for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤 지연을 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 실행는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand> 세로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 끌면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />를 사용하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> is enabled in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> and the size of the content is larger than the display area; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />에 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />가 사용되고 콘텐츠의 크기가 표시 영역보다 크면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <see langword="true" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.IsEnabledCore%2A> to `true` only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.IsEnabledCore%2A> 를 `true` 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 보다 크면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 값 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The command that scrolls a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> by a small amount in the vertical direction of increasing value of its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 값이 늘어나는 세로 방향으로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />를 적은 양만큼 스크롤하는 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: This command increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령은 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 의 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: This command occurs when the user presses the DOWN ARROW key.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령은 아래쪽 화살표 키를 누를 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> executes this command.

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs multiple times when the user changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> by dragging the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.

trans-unit.source: There is no limit to the number of times this event is raised as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> position is dragged.

trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 일반적인 스타일 템플릿을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 주위에 어느 쪽에 두 개의 제어 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is used with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 액세스 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 제어와 함께 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 현재 볼 수 있는 스크롤 가능한 콘텐츠의 양을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 현재 표시되는 스크롤 가능한 콘텐츠의 양입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 0입니다.

trans-unit.source: The units that are used for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A> are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content.
trans-unit.target: 에 사용 되는 단위 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A> 콘텐츠의 길이 설명 하는 데 사용 되는 단위와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: Some examples include lines of text or pages of text.
trans-unit.target: 몇 가지 예는 줄의 텍스트 또는 텍스트 페이지를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A> property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A> 속성의 크기를 계산을 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 이동 값 표시기로 표시 되는 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control's size represents the amount of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 정도 나타내는 컨트롤의 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 표시 되는 컨트롤의 콘텐츠입니다.

trans-unit.source: If 25 percent of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content is visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> occupies 25 percent of the track in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우의 25%는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 컨트롤의 내용이 표시 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 의 트랙의 25%를 차지 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can decide which units <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A> uses.
trans-unit.target: 어떤 단위를 결정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A> 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, make sure that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties use the same units.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 하는 경우 다음 사항을 확인는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 속성 같은 단위를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> size reflects the amount of content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 크기 표시 되는 콘텐츠 양을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ![The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar")
trans-unit.target: ![추적 길이 및 스크롤 막대의 엄지 단추 크기](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "추적 길이 및 스크롤 막대의 엄지 단추 크기")
